algorithm_technique: Calculate differences, then sum positive differences of adjacent elements.
problem_summary_simple: Change subarrays by adding/subtracting 1 to make nums equal to target.
problem_summary_technical: Transforming nums to target by subarray increments/decrements. Key is difference array and summing positive adjacent differences.
key_insights: The core idea is to realize that operations on subarrays can be thought of as point updates on the difference array.
An operation on a subarray `nums[i..j]` by `+1` is equivalent to `diff[i] += 1` and `diff[j+1] -= 1`.
The minimum operations correspond to the sum of positive differences between adjacent elements in the transformed `target - nums` array.
